concept_definition: At a fast speed; with little delay or taking little time.
At a slow speed; not quickly; taking a relatively long time to move, happen, or be done.
In a good or satisfactory manner; to a high standard or degree (e.g., "She sings well").
In a poor or unsatisfactory manner; to a severe or serious degree.
In a loud manner; with a high volume or great intensity of sound.
In a quiet manner; making little or no noise; without drawing attention (e.g., speaking or acting softly or silently).
Without difficulty; in a way that is done or achieved with little effort or problems.
in a way that requires a lot of effort or is difficult; with great force or intensity (e.g., "She worked hard," "The ball hit the window hard").
In or into one group, body, mass, or place; with each other; in companionship or cooperation; simultaneously or at the same time.
without anyone else present; by oneself
